name: Loki, Lord of the Aesir
text:
1 Tuner + 2+ non-Tuner monsters
Once per turn, when a card or effect is activated in your opponent's Spell & Trap Zone in response to this card's attack declaration (Quick Effect): You can negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if this card is in the Graveyard because this face-up card on the field was destroyed and sent to there this turn: You can Special Summon this card. When Summoned this way: You can target 1 Trap in your Graveyard; add that target to your hand.
